name: Froopy
description:
Froopy is a game where you have to switch colors (black & white) to activate platforms or avoid obstacles. An engaging, 10 levels experience that will provide you with a challenge.

Controls

Move Left/Right Arrows Space Jump Switch Shift

Credits

Art & Programming Shurooq Juma Music Purple-Planet.com Sound Effects OpenGameArt.org

* Social links don't work on the WebGL version
